tool_description: This api can get Forbes worlds billionaires list by year. You can search and filter by country.
name: Forbes worlds billionaires list
title: Forbes worlds billionaires list

api_list.name: Get Billionaires
api_list.description: This method can get you full list of Forbes billionaires by year.If you want you can search by name or filtered by country or country of citizenship. This api can get list of people page by page and you can search max 100 limit per one request.

required_parameters.name: size
required_parameters.description: You can search max 100 person list per one request.
